messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Back to School (was had a crappy day)
messages.msgSnippet: ... I hate that they close the pools when school starts, we can t go anymore, even if it s 90 degrees, and that sucks. My son is going to miss his friends!
messages.messageBody:
grlynbl@... writes:
> LOL.. first time we have ever been happy
> to see it come around.
>
> Teresa
>

I hate that they close the pools when school starts, we can't go anymore,
even if it's 90 degrees, and that sucks.

My son is going to miss his friends! He's been playing outside all day,
every day all summer. He hates waiting for them to come home, watches the clock
like a hawk.

But I LOVE the school supply sales....I bought glue and pencils and pens and
Mead Composition pads, oh my! hee hee A drawing pad, construction paper, and
a corkboard....just too much fun, all that good stuff, to pass it up. School
shopping was the only thing I ever liked about school. ;-) No reason for me
to give that up, right?

~Aimee


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
